org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.auth
Class AbstractAuthTokenProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.auth.AbstractAuthTokenProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthTokenProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileAuthTokenProvider
public abstract class AbstractAuthTokenProvider
extends Object
implements AuthTokenProvider

An abstract implementation of the AuthTokenProvider interface. This implementation caches the current token for fast getAuthToken() calls and provides proper locking to be thread-safe.

Child classes must provide the persistence layer by implementing the readToken() and writeToken(AuthToken) methods.

Author:
David R. Bild

Method Detail

readToken

protected abstract AuthToken readToken()
                                throws IOException
Gets the current authentication token.

This method is not guaranteed to be called after each writeToken(AuthToken) call, because this class implements authentication token caching.

Returns:
the current authentication token.
Throws:
IOException - if the current token could not be retrieved.

writeToken

protected abstract void writeToken(AuthToken token)
                            throws IOException
Persists the new authentication token.

Parameters:
token - the new authentication token.
Throws:
IOException - if the new token could not be persisted.
